name: Death's Miracle
desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Nihility. Inflicts Burn, Shock, Bleed, and 2 stacks of Wind Shear to all enemy targets, lasting for 3 turn(s). After being attacked by a character, the aforementioned DoTs immediately deal DMG equal to 25% of the original DMG.
